request: How can I take the things done in the Orchestrator 3 Stream system and apply it to my Claude Code config to make it more deterministic instead of having the agents update the state?

success_criteria.description: Can map Orchestrator DB models to Claude Code session state concepts
Can identify which Orchestrator patterns apply vs. require infrastructure
Can provide concrete integration patterns for hooks, state, and workflows
Can assess trade-offs of file-based vs. database-backed state

subtasks.objective: Analyze Orchestrator DB schema and state models for deterministic patterns
subtasks.boundaries: Focus on models and schema, not UI/frontend code

subtasks.objective: Understand Claude Code session state.json structure and current update patterns
subtasks.boundaries: Focus on state management, not skill workflows

subtasks.objective: Investigate ADW workflows for deterministic step execution patterns
subtasks.boundaries: Focus on workflow orchestration, not specific implementation details

subtasks.objective: Examine hook systems in both codebases for observability patterns
subtasks.boundaries: Focus on event capture and logging, not TTS or notification hooks

subtasks.objective: Identify integration patterns and trade-offs for applying Orchestrator concepts to Claude Code config
subtasks.boundaries: Focus on practical applicability, not full database migration
